title: Instagram is reportedly slashing Reels Play Bonus payouts
content:
Shortly after expanding ads in Instagram Reels to all regions last year, Meta announced the Reels Play Bonus program. The program incentivized creators to make Reels on the platform in return for a handsome reward ranging from $600 to an eye-watering $35,000. description: Instagram is reportedly cutting Reels Play Bonus payouts to creators by up to 70 percent per view. Read on to learn more.
